explains: vt. 约束，限定；在……上画圈；包围；（几何学）外接

sentences.en: Do not circumscribe your study only in classes.
sentences.cn: 不要把自己的学习只局限于课堂。

sentences.en: He promised, too, to scrap some of the many rules that circumscribe daily life.
sentences.cn: 他还承诺要废除那许多限制日常生活的规章制度。

sentences.en: Here the basic method to circumscribe contradiction is paraconsistent logic.
sentences.cn: 这里，限制矛盾的基本手法是次协调逻辑。
